meta.dc:subject: legislation
meta.dc:rights: the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

section.name: s2
section.heading: Hawker permitted places
section.content: The street specified in the first column of the First Schedule is, to the extent specified opposite thereto in the third column of the First Schedule, set aside as a place permitted to be used for hawking purposes.

section.name: s3
section.heading: Hawker permitted places
section.content: The streets specified in the first column of the Second Schedule and the exact boundaries of which are demarcated by road markings are, to the extent specified opposite thereto in the second column (and, where applicable, in the third column) of the Second Schedule, set aside as places to be used for hawking purposes.
